subject: Hi Group!
author: Chad
full_text:
Hi,

I'd like to introduce myself. Didn't feel like I should until I
uploaded some files, so you will find 2 that I have uploaded thus far.
My name is Chad, I live in Georgia. I am part of a fledgling
paranormal group here. Just wanted to say "hi." Frank is a hero to me,
and a pioneer to us all, so when I found this place, I had to join. 

See ya round the forum,

Chad
